entry.title: Not able to find API for " SALES QUOTATION SIMULATE" in S4HPC
entry.content:
Hi all,
I  am not able to find API for " Sales quotation simulate" in S4 Hana Public Cloud . Please share your inputs if you have any other options to do it, Thanks in advance 

Thanks,
Prawin

entry.title: Challenges in Updating Custom Field During PO Creation from Purchase contract in S/4HANA PublicCloud
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

My requirement is to update the Open Quantity (a custom field at the item level). For this, I created a custom field and mapped it to the Manage Purchase Contract app at the item level, after the Target Quantity column.

The logic is: when creating a Purchase Order from the Manage Purchase Contract app, the Open Quantity should be calculated as:
Target Quantity – Ordered Quantity

To achieve this, I tried the following BADIs:

  1. MM_PUR_S4_CTR_MODIFY_ITEM – This is triggered only when creating a Manage Purchase Contract.

  2. MM_PUR_S4_PO_MODIFY_ITEM – This is triggered while creating a Purchase Order from Manage Purchase Contract, but the custom Open Quantity field value is not updating from this BADI.

Could you please share your suggestions on how to update the custom Open Quantity field correctly?

I have gone through some standard documentation but could not find concrete details for these scenarios. If anyone has already implemented a similar requirement, it would be very helpful if you could share:

  • Blogs, SAP Notes, or official references
  • Your implementation experiences or best practices
  • Any limitations or workarounds you came across in Public Cloud

Your valuable inputs will help us in moving forward with this requirement.

Thanks in advance for your support!

entry.title: Does SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Support OCR-based Invoice Document Capture Without Ariba Central?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I have a question regarding invoice processing capabilities in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud.

Does SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud have a built-in feature to scan and capture supplier invoices (PDF or paper format) using OCR technology and import them as documents into the system?

I'm aware that integrating with SAP Ariba Central Invoice Management is one option for this functionality. However, I'm wondering if this can be achieved using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud as a standalone solution, without requiring additional Ariba licensing.

Any insights or guidance would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: How to consume APIs in custom RAP application for SAP public cloud(3SL)
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am currently working on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3-System Landscape) and developing a RAP application using Eclipse with ABAP Development Tools (ADT).

My requirement is to consume an external API (not based on database tables) within the RAP application and expose it as an OData service/UI.

Could you please guide me on the following points:

  • What are the steps required to consume an external API in a RAP application in the Public Cloud environment?

  • Are there any step-by-step guides or examples available for consuming APIs in RAP applications in the 3-system landscape?

Additionally, it would be very helpful if you could share best practices, required configurations, and sample code snippets related to API consumption in RAP for SAP Public Cloud.

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards,
Sanjay

entry.title: AI Demo Ideas for S/4HANA Public Cloud (2508 TDD) - Finance/Accounting Focus
entry.content:
Hi everyone,
I need some advice from the community.

Our customer's executive has requested an AI-focused demo using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud edition. The focus should be on Finance/Accounting or cross-functional processes.

Context: Environment: 2508 TDD system
Constraint: Cannot use other products like SAP Ariba Central Invoice Management
Target audience: C-level executives in food manufacturing/retail industry
My scope: Accounting/Finance modules

What I'm looking for:
An "AI-powered" or "next-generation" demo that:

Looks impressive and innovative
Doesn't require extensive setup (realistic prep time)
Can be demonstrated within standard S/4HANA Public Cloud capabilities
Preferably something other than Joule (looking for alternatives!)

Initial thoughts:

Predictive analytics for cash flow?
Intelligent automation in financial closing?
ML-based anomaly detection?

Has anyone successfully demonstrated similar scenarios? What worked well? Any tips on quick wins that showcase AI capabilities effectively?
Thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: OAuth2.0 Authentication for S4HC APIs
entry.content:
Hi Experts,
We are trying to set up non-user interactive OAuth2.0 Authentication for S4HC APIs, to access the APIs from third party applications
Can this be achieved without BTP?
Also are the Standard APIs restricted to use only OAuth2.0 Access code flow? or can other grant types be used?


Cause when I try to set up inbound OAuth2.0 Clients in my customizing tenant, the grant type is disabled and only shows Authorization code + PKCE


And if i were to add my OAuth2.0 Provider, the autogenerated inbound Oauth2.0 clients have the grant type SAML2 Bearer Assertion. Are these the only two grant types that can be configured in the Tenant?
If BTP is my only option, could you please direct me to blogs with steps to set up Oauth2.0 client credentials in cockpit (Cloud foundry) and s4hana cloud instance and finally test from postman?
@Andre_Fischer @Sandra_Rossi @Amin_Omidy @quovadis

entry.title: Guidance Needed: Creating KPI Report with Graphs and KPI Cards in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear SAP Exports,

I am creating a KPI report based on CDS views and analytical reports. I have tried three options — Generic Drilldown, Analytical List Page, and Data Analyzer and I also created stories. However, the report is not displaying correctly across the three display types and would like to know which option is best for visualizing the entire report in graphical form and for presenting data in KPI cards.

Could you please provide step-by-step instructions for creating a KPI report with graphical visualizations and KPI cards? 

Thank you and kind regards,

entry.title: Add Field in SO Form Template datasource
entry.content:
I would like to add Size/Dimensions field from product master in SO form template.

 I add Size/Dimensions field to SO form template ds via Custom Fields>Datasource Extensions

Then when I download the SO xml file, the field is included but the value is missing. Why?

Is there anything else I need to do?

Best Regards,

Khaing Zin

entry.title: API for Commodity code in s4 public cloud
entry.content:
Dear SAP,

We have a customer requirement to create commodity codes in S4 Public Cloud using external software. The customer’s system is capable of creating products along with commodity codes, however, in S4 this process occurs in a different place.

From what I have reviewed, the standard integration does not support commodity code creation. Could you please advise if there is any alternate approach to create and classify commodity codes in S4—perhaps through a program, extension, or workaround?

Your guidance on the best possible solution will be highly appreciated

Regards

Janarthanan

SAP S/4HANA Global Trade Management

entry.title: Regarding the Logic of Custom Business Objects
entry.content:
Dear All.

We have created custom fields based on a custom business object. The target for creation is master data (business partner).

While I believe the custom business object allows defining field values, I want it to generate an error during BP registration if any value other than those defined for that field is registered as the custom field value.

Can this be handled using the logic of the custom business object?

If there is another way to achieve this, please let me know.

Best Regards,

Yuki Tsumura

entry.title: How to create custom communication scenarios in S4H Public Cloud Dev Tenant ?
entry.content:
Dear Community,

We have developed OData services directly on the S/4HANA Public Cloud development tenant and created a UI in BAS to consume these services (using the Developer Extensibility approach). During testing in BAS, we need to create custom communication scenarios; however, the option to create custom communication scenarios in the development tenant is currently greyed out/disabled.

Based on the information provided in SAP Note 2486898, to enable the creation of custom communication scenarios, we need to activate Key User Extensibility using the Extensibility Settings app. However, when we attempt to do this in the development tenant, the system displays a message indicating that Key User Extensibility is disabled in the development tenant and that the Customizing tenant should be used instead.

In the Customizing tenant, Key User Extensibility is enabled, and we are able to create communication scenarios. However, we cannot transport the OData services to the Customizing tenant without first testing them in the Development tenant.

Is there a way to test the services in BAS while connecting directly to the Development tenant?

Thank you!

Regards,

Karthik

entry.title: How to add account assignment columns to PR item table in My Inbox (Public Cloud)?
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I’m working in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition and have a question regarding the "My Inbox" app for the overall release of Purchase Requisitions (PR).

Currently, when I open a PR approval task in My Inbox, the item details are shown in a table inside the task UI. This table displays standard columns like material, quantity, price, etc.

My requirement:
I need to add additional columns to this table for account assignment data—specifically:

  • GL account
  • Cost center
  • WBS element

The goal is to show these fields directly in the item table, so approvers don’t have to drill down into each item’s detail screen.

Questions:

  1. Is there any supported way in Public Cloud to enhance the columns of the item table in the My Inbox task UI?
  2. Can this be achieved via Custom Fields and Logic, or any BAdI/CDS extension?
  3. If not possible, what are the recommended alternatives?

Any guidance, documentation, or best practices would be greatly appreciated.

Kind Regards,
Simon

entry.title: Is it possible to have value help for custom field based on authorisation?
entry.content:
Hi,

We are creating a custom field in the system with the code list that has company code and ISB number.

Since it has company code, it should show only the values based on company code authorization. This means the user who does not have access to particular company code, should not be able to see values in code list for that company code.

 

Can you please let us know if this is possible in cloud?

Thanks & regards

entry.title: Entity PRODUCTPURCHASEORDERTEXT is not maintainable in Product API error
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am working with the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition and trying to perform a POST operation using the Product (API_PRODUCT_2) API.
However, I’m receiving the following error response:

{
  "error": {
    "code": "CMD_PROD_RAP/011",
    "message": "Entity PRODUCTPURCHASEORDERTEXT is not maintainable",
    "target": "_ProductPurchaseOrderText(Product='102010000009',TextObjectType='BEST',Language='EN')",
    "details": [
      {
        "code": "CMD_PROD_RAP/011",
        "message": "Entity PRODUCTPROCUREMENT is not maintainable",
        "target": "_ProductProcurement"
      },
      {
        "code": "CMD_PROD_RAP/011",
        "message": "Entity PRODUCTPLANTPROCUREMENT is not maintainable",
        "target": "_ProductPlant(Product='102010000009',Plant='CN7A')/_ProductPlantProcurement"
      }
    ],
    "innererror": {
      "ErrorDetails": {
        "@SAP__common.Application": {
          "ComponentId": "LO-MD-MM",
          "ServiceRepository": "SRVD_A2X",
          "ServiceId": "API_PRODUCT_2",
          "ServiceVersion": "0001"
        },
        "@SAP__common.TransactionId": "86545C3DDA130010E0068E7D20C1703B",
        "@SAP__common.Timestamp": "20251009154237.258522",
        "@SAP__common.ErrorResolution": {
          "Analysis": "Use ADT feed reader 'SAP Gateway Error Log' or run transaction /IWFND/ERROR_LOG on SAP Gateway hub system and search for entries with the timestamp above for more details",
          "Note": "See SAP Note 1797736 for error analysis"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

My Question:

  • Why are these entities (PRODUCTPURCHASEORDERTEXT, PRODUCTPROCUREMENT, PRODUCTPLANTPROCUREMENT) not maintainable through the post API?

  • Are there any restrictions in the Public Cloud Edition for maintaining these sub-entities via API?

  • Is there an alternative API or approach to update these product procurement or purchase order text details?

 

I’ve already checked the payload structure and API reference documentation, and the JSON is valid. The base product entity is being read successfully — the error occurs only during the POST operation.

Any insights or SAP Notes related to this behavior would be highly appreciated.

Thanks in advance,
Janarthanan R.

entry.title: How to change the setting of Key User Extensibility in the APP:Extensibility Settings
entry.content:
Dear Experts

I created a new UI Adaptation and want to use Export Software Collection to transfer it from the Develop environment to the Test environment.

When using Extensibility Settings to configure the transfer, I noticed that Key User Extensibility and Key User Development are set to OFF and NO, and both buttons are grayed out.

I now need to enable both to ON or YES, but I'm unsure which app to use and the specific steps involved.

 

Any insights or examples would be really appreciated.

Thanks!

YIN

entry.title: Unable to extend standard Fiori app
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I’m working on the standard SAP Fiori app F1643A – on SAP S/4HANA 2023 (on-premise S03).
Documentation: https://fioriappslibrary.hana.ondemand.com/sap/fix/externalViewer/#/detail/Apps('F1643A')/S30OP 

The requirement is to display some custom fields that were generated and are already available in the classic ME51N transaction.

However, in the app documentation link above, I couldn’t find the “Extension” tab, does that mean that the app cannot be extended ? or is there another way to enable those fields in this app?

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: Extend the Manage Purchase Order FIORI app (F0842A) with an existing field from EKPO
entry.content:
Hello All,

I am still new to FIORI app extensions, so your feedback is much appreciated. I have the following requirement.

I need to extend the Manage Purchase Order App (F0842A) with an existing field from EKPO. The extension needs to occur at the Item level of the Purchase order since the field is from EKPO. And the field should also be available when one tries to create a purchase order via the app.

I tried to achieve this using CDS view extension but it is failing. I have extended the following CDS views:

E_PurchasingDocumentItem----->I_PurchaseOrderItemTP------->C_PurchaseOrderItemTP.

I am able to see the data in SQL viewer but while trying open the FIORI app, it throws a dump stating the following:

From the error, I understand that the field I am using in the CDS views needs to be incorporated in the table PURORDITMTP_D. And here the extension is done by adding the field in EKPO_INCL_EEW_PS. But this is creating an entirely new custom field and defeats the purpose of using the existing field from EKPO.

Could anyone please guide me through this? Is this even possible with CDS extension ? Or do I need to look for FIORI APP extensibility project to achieve this requirement?

 

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Change Acct Assmt Grp Mat. field in Manage Credit Memo Request
entry.content:
I would like to change Acct Assmt Grp Mat. field value in Credit Memo Request Item.

Best Regards,

Khaing Zin

entry.title: Custom Report/Query with Business Partner ID and Custom Field for Business Partner
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I need to create a custom report/cds view/querie that includes the fields Business Partner ID and a custom field maintained on the Business Partner.

Does anyone know which data sources/views I can use to build such a report?

Thanks in advance!

Katharina

entry.title: Clarification on Total Limit and Utilization of Custom Fields Across Business Contexts
entry.content:
Dear SAP, 

 

I would like to get clarification on the following questions: 

  1. What is the total limit of Custom Fields available per Business Context?

  2. For the Business Contexts “Sales Document” and “Sales Document Item”, what exactly is the limit?

  3. Is the limit defined in KB/MB or by the number of characters? Please specify the exact storage capacity (e.g., how many KBs/MBs or characters can be stored).

  4. How is the limit utilization calculated or monitored for Custom Fields? For instance, how can we determine how much of the allowed capacity has already been consumed?

 

Can you help?

Thanks! 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.
